metadata.title: Evaluate to true
metadata.description: This definition is intended to always evaluate to true.

criterion.comment: This test always evaluates to true.

metadata.title: Evaluate to false
metadata.description: This definition is intended to always evaluate to false.

criterion.comment: This test always evaluates to true.

metadata.title: Evaluate to true if the oval-def:extend_definition construct is properly supported
metadata.description: This definition is intended to evalutate to true if the interpreter properly supports the oval-def:extend_definition construct with the negate attribute set to false.

metadata.title: Evaluate to true if the oval-def:extend_definition construct is properly supported
metadata.description: This definition is intended to evalutate to true if the interpreter properly supports the oval-def:extend_definition construct with the negate attribute set to true.

variable_test.comment: This test always evaluates to true.

variable_object.comment: This variable_object represents the boolean value 'true'.

variable_state.comment: This variable_state represents a boolean value that is equal to 'true'.

constant_variable.comment: This variable represents the boolean value 'true'.
